name: strfind
description: Search for a sub string in a string.

params_body.name: const string[]
params_body.description: The string you want to search in (haystack).

params_body.name: const sub[]
params_body.description: The string you want to search for (needle).

params_body.name: ignorecase (optional)
params_body.description: When set to true, the case doesn't matter - HeLLo is the same as Hello. When false, they're not the same.

params_body.name: Position (optional)
params_body.description: The offset to start searching from.

return_values: The number of characters before the sub string (the sub string's start position) or -1 if it's not found.
related_fn:
strcmp: Compare two strings to check if they are the same.
 strtok: Get the next 'token' (word/parameter) in a string.
 strdel: Delete part of a string.
 strins: Insert text into a string.
 strlen: Get the length of a string.
 strmid: Extract part of a string into another string.
 strpack: Pack a string into a destination string.
 strval: Convert a string into an integer.
 strcat: Concatenate two strings into a destination reference.
